Title: 'I'm overjoyed to be back': Syrians face daunting rebuild after years of war

Title: 'I thought the abuse was normal - he was my first proper boyfriend'

Title: Birthright citizenship heads to court. And, more roadblocks to Trump's 'big' bill
Description:
The Supreme Court will hear historic arguments over birthright citizenship today.
And, House Republicans are working to advance Trump's "big beautiful bill," but there is division over policies.

Title: Majority of Americans oppose ending birthright citizenship, NPR/Ipsos poll finds
Description:
As the Supreme Court takes up birthright citizenship, a new poll finds that less than a third of Americans want it to end.
But other parts of the White House's immigration crackdown are more popular.

Title: Tech companies want humans to help level up AI models. What's your price for training them?
Description: The humanization of AI is turning into a nice side hustle, and it's an interesting dilemma for the humans paid to train them.

Title: Uber's robotaxi chief says the company will still need human drivers, but their jobs will look very different
Description: Uber SVP Andrew Macdonald said human drivers will soon face serious competition from self-driving taxis in city centers.

Title: I'm a Gen Xer who can't find a full-time job 2 years after a layoff. I'm struggling to rebuild my identity.
Description: In 2023, Arran Skinner opened his email to find he'd been let go from his job as a multimedia and press relations expert in the humanitarian field.

Title: Fewer Ideas: An Unconventional Approach To Creativity

Title: Next-gen CarPlay, branded CarPlay Ultra, starts rolling out today
Description:
After months of delays, Apple officially announced the launch of next-gen CarPlay, now with a new brand name of ‘CarPlay Ultra’.
From today, CarPlay Ultra is available with new Aston Martin vehicle orders in the United States and Canada, and a software update…
